name: Carrying is Caring
description:
This game was made for Ludum Dare 46. The theme was Keep It Alive.
https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/46/carrying-is-caring
The goal is to kill all enemies and reach the end. You can attack them when they're in range, but only damage them when you're not holding the jar.

  • WASD - walk
  • Space - jump
  • Shift - dash
  • Mouse - Rotate camera
  • Left mouse button - Attack
  • Right mouse button - Throw Jar in Air
